Num.FuncTxt: local value = 150 local abil = GetAbility(self, "Cryomancer25") if abil ~= nil and abil.ActiveState == 1 then value = 0 end return value
local value = 40 local abil = GetAbility(self, "Cryomancer25") if abil ~= nil and abil.ActiveState == 1 then value = 5 end return value
local value = 1 local abil = GetAbility(self, "Cryomancer25") if abil ~= nil and abil.ActiveState == 1 then value = 0 end return value
local skillLv = obj.Level; local value = 1 / skillLv ; return value;
